title: BigBitz
author: BigBitz
content: I have a couple 1BTC all silvers 2013 coins and a 1 TitanBTC solid gold coin [error coin, super rare @Michail1 can confirm] which I am gauging interest for. I’d be happy to initially hear if anyone UK/Ireland based would be interested.I am only interested in a BTC transaction and not fiat based transaction. I would be looking 1.1BTC minimum.If there is interest I will supply better pics etc.Thanks guys!I have done various physical coin trades with @NightOwlace with @minerjones as escrow. I am happy to escrow at buyers costs.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: some proofs of your said coins would definitely increase your chances of selling. in addition to the proofs i would also post the respective BTC addresses of the coinsgl with your sell

comments.author: BigBitz
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on July 24, 2023, 01:54:59 PMsome proofs of your said coins would definitely increase your chances of selling. in addition to the proofs i would also post the respective BTC addresses of the coinsgl with your sellNo doubt. I can provide all that information as I have done on previous threads before. I prefer to deal with DM as opposed to constantly posting pics/addresses. I have been around BCT and Bitcoin-OTC a while. I am fairly trusted I'd say

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Howdy....read this very informative thread made by Satslife a few back.    How to buy and sell here   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0   Follow what he advises and you cannot do no wrong with the info provided.   Goodluck with your sale!

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: DM sent, im very interested. thank you =)

comments.author: BigBitz
comments.body: 1BTC Cas Silver sold to a winning bid and going to escrow with MJ.Thank you, buyer. They can reveal themselves if they wish

comments.author: BigBitz
comments.body: All coins I had planned for sale have sold. I have one remaining which is a Titan 1oz Solid Gold private key version of the coin. It remains fully funded.Thanks to all winning buyers. All coins shipped and received
